com.captainalm.lib.stdcrypt.encryption

Class AESPasswordRfc2898CipherFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.captainalm.lib.stdcrypt.encryption.AESPasswordRfc2898CipherFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICipherFactory

    public class AESPasswordRfc2898CipherFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICipherFactory
    This class provides an AES cipher that uses Rfc2898 for key generation and a string password.
    Author:
    Captain ALM

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new instance of AESPasswordRfc2898CipherFactory with the specified password, salt and initialization vector.

      • AESPasswordRfc2898CipherFactory

        public AESPasswordRfc2898CipherFactory(java.lang.String password,
                                       byte[] salt,
                                       byte[] initializationVector)
        Constructs a new instance of AESPasswordRfc2898CipherFactory with the specified password, salt and initialization vector.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to use.
        salt - The salt to use or null.
        initializationVector - The initialization vector to use or null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - password is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - salt or initializationVector is larger than 255.
